subject: Re: Order #SSN4309 confirmed
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

reaching out to you to ask about the status of the order Order #SSN4309.

Only one item has been shipped and delivered. It was understanble as the
other product was a preorder, however there was no further information
about the progress and as I understand the shipping has started.

Please inform me on the current status of the order.

Best regards,
Gabriel
